SA20vasvvmsu:2: cittamātraṃ bho jinaputrā yad uta traidhātukam iti sūtrāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:3: cittaṃ mano vijñānaṃ vijñaptiś ceti paryāyāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:11: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptir yadi nārthataḥ // 2 //
SA20vasvvmsu:13: yadi vinā rūpādyarthena rūpādivijñaptir utpadyate na rūpādyarthāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:14: kasmāt kvacid deśa utpadyate na sarvatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:15: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid utpadyate na sarvadā /
SA20vasvvmsu:16: taddeśakālapratiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃtānāniyama utpadyate na kevalam ekasya /
SA20vasvvmsu:18: kasmād yat taimirikaiḥ keśabhramarādi dṛśyate tena keśādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:19: yad annapānavastraviṣāyudhādi svapne dṛśyate tenānnādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:20: gandharvanagareṇāsattvān nagarakriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:21: tasmād asadabhāvāvabhāsane deśakālaniyamaḥ saṃtānāniyamaḥ kṛtyakriyā ca na yujyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:26: svapne vināpy arthena kvacid eva deśe kiṃcid bhramarārāmastrīpurūṣādikaṃ dṛśyate na sarvatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:27: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid dṛśyate na sarvakālam iti siddho vināpy arthena deśakālaniyamaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:37: tulyakarmavipākāvasthā hi pretāḥ sarve 'pi pūyapūrṇāṃ nadīṃ paśyanti naika eva /
SA20vasvvmsu:38: yathā pūyapūrṇām evaṃ mūtrapurīṣādipūrṇāṃ daṇḍāsidharaiś ca puruṣair adhiṣṭhitām ity ādigrahaṇena /
SA20vasvvmsu:39: evaṃ saṃtānāniyamo vijñaptinām asaty apy arthe siddhaḥ //
SA20vasvvmsu:42: yathā svapne dvayasamāpattim antareṇa śukravisargalakṣaṇaḥ svapnopaghātaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:43: evaṃ tāvad anyānyair dṛṣṭāntair deśakālaniyamādicatuṣṭayaṃ siddhaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:50: yathā hi narakeṣu nārakāṇāṃ narakapālādidarśanaṃ deśakālaniyamena siddhaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:52: sarveṣāṃ ca naikasyaiva taiś ca tadbādhanaṃ siddham asatsv api narakapālādiṣu samānasvakarmavipākādhipatyāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:53: tathānyatrāpi sarvam etad deśakālaniyamādicatuṣtayaṃ siddham iti veditavyaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:54: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ narakapālās te ca śvāno vāyasāś ca sattvā neṣyante /
SA20vasvvmsu:58: parasparaṃ yātayatām ime nārakā ime narakapālā iti vyavasthā na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:59: tulyākṛtipramāṇabalānāṃ ca parasparaṃ yātayatāṃ na tathā bhayaṃ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:60: dāhaduḥkhaṃ ca pradīptāyām ayomayyāṃ bhūmāv asahamānāḥ kathaṃ tatra parān yātayeyuḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:63: evaṃ narakeṣu tiryakpretaviśeṣāṇāṃ narakapālādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:64: tiraścāṃ saṃbhavaḥ svarge yathā na narake tathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:65: na pretānāṃ yatas tajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // 5 //
SA20vasvvmsu:66: ye hi tiryañcaḥ svarge saṃbhavanti te tadbhājanalokasukhasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā tatra saṃbhūtās tajjaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:67: na caiva narakapālādayo nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:68: tasmān na tiraścāṃ saṃbhavo yukto nāpi pretānāṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:69: teṣāṃ tarhi [Vvs_5] nārakāṇāṃ karmabhis tatra bhūtaviśeṣāḥ saṃbhavanti varṇākṛtipramāṇabalaviśiṣṭā ye narakapālādisaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
SA20vasvvmsu:71: yad dvidhāṃ hastavikṣepādikriyāṃ kurvanto dṛśyante bhayotpādanārthaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:72: yathā meṣākṛtayaḥ parvatā āgacchanto gacchanto 'yaḥśālmalīvane ca kaṇṭakā adhomukhībhavanta ūrddhvamukhībhavantaś ceti /
SA20vasvvmsu:74: yadi tatkarmabhis tatra bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavas tathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:75: iṣyate pariṇāmaś ca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // 6 //
SA20vasvvmsu:76: vijñānasyaiva tatkarmabhis tathā pariṇāmaḥ kasmān neṣyate kiṃ punar bhūtāni kalpyante //
SA20vasvvmsu:79: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ // 7 //
SA20vasvvmsu:80: yena hi karmaṇā nārakāṇāṃ tatra tādṛśo bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kalpyate pariṇāmaś ca tasya karmaṇo vāsanā teṣāṃ vijñānasaṃtānasaṃniviṣṭā nānyatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:81: yatraiva ca vāsanā tatraiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ tādṛśo vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:82: yatra vāsanā nāsti tatra tasyāḥ phalaṃ kalpyata iti kim atra kāraṇaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:84: yadi vijñānam eva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ syān na rūpādiko 'rthas tadā rūpādyāyatanāstitvaṃ bhagavatā noktaṃ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:88: yathāsti sattva upapāduka ity uktaṃ bhagavatā abhiprāyavaśāc cittasaṃtatyanucchedam āyatyām abhipretya /
SA20vasvvmsu:89: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmās tv ete sahetukāḥ
SA20vasvvmsu:91: evaṃ rūpādyāyatanāstitvam apy uktaṃ bhagavatā taddeśanāvineyajanam adhikṛtyety ābhiprāyikaṃ tad vacanaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:96_0: rūpapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate tac ca bījaṃ
SA20vasvvmsu:96_1: yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā vijñapteś cakṣūrūpāyatanatvena [Vvs_6] yathākramaṃ bhagavān abravīt /
SA20vasvvmsu:97_0: evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate
SA20vasvvmsu:97_1: tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā kāyaspraṣṭavyāyatanatvena yathākranaṃ
SA20vasvvmsu:98: evaṃ punar abhiprāyavaśena deśayitvā ko guṇāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:102: na tu kaścid eko draṣṭāsti na yāvan mantety evaṃ viditvā ye pudgalanairātmyadeśanāvineyās te pudgalanairātmyaṃ praviśanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:107: vijñaptimātram idaṃ rūpādidharmapratibhāsam utpadyate na tu rūpādilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ ko 'py astīti viditvā /
SA20vasvvmsu:108: yadi tarhi sarvathā dharmo nāsti tad api vijñaptimātraṃ nāstīti kathaṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:109: na khalu sarvathā dharmo nāstīty evaṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśo bhavati / api tu /
SA20vasvvmsu:111: yo bālair dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakādiḥ parikalpatas tena kalpitenātmanā teṣāṃ nairātmyaṃ na tv anabhilāpyenātmanā yo buddhānāṃ viṣaya iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:112: evaṃ vijñaptimātrasyāpi vijñaptyantaraparikalpitenātmanā nairātmyapraveśāt vijñaptimātravyavasthāpanayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyapraveśo bhavati na tu tadastitvāpavādāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:113: itarathā hi vijñapter api vijñaptyantaram arthaḥ syād iti vijñaptimātratvaṃ na sidhyetārthavatītvād vijñaptīnāṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:114: kathaṃ punar idaṃ pratyetavyam anenābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā rūpādyāyatanāstitvam uktaṃ na punaḥ santy eva tāni yāni rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayībhavanti iti / yasmāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:115: na tad ekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:116: na ca te saṃhatā yasmāt paramāṇur na sidhyati // 11 //
SA20vasvvmsu:118: yat tadrūpādikam āyatanaṃ rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayaḥ syāt tad ekaṃ vā syād yathāvayavirūpaṃ kalpyate vaiśeṣikaiḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:121: na tāvad ekaṃ viṣayo bhavaty avayavebhyo 'nyasyāvayavirūpasya kvacid apy agrahaṇāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:124: yasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati //
SA20vasvvmsu:127: ṣaḍbhyo digbhyaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhir yugapad yoge sati paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā prāpnoti /
SA20vasvvmsu:131: atha ya evaikasya paramāṇor deśaḥ sa eva ṣaṇṇāṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:132: tena sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraḥ syāt parasparāvyatirekād iti na kaścit piṇḍo dṛśyaḥ syāt //
SA20vasvvmsu:135: saṃhatās tu parasparaṃ saṃyujyanta iti kāśmīravaibhāṣikās ta idaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:136: yaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghāto na sa tebhyo 'rthāntaram iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:140: atha saṃghātā apy anyonyaṃ na saṃyujyante /
SA20vasvvmsu:141: na tarhi paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvāt saṃyogo na sidhyatīti vaktavyaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:143: tasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati /
SA20vasvvmsu:144: yadi ca paramāṇoḥ saṃyoga iṣyate yadi vā neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:146: anyo hi paramāṇoḥ pūrvadigbhāgo yāvad adhodigbhāga iti digbhāgabhede sati kathaṃ tadātmakasya paramāṇor ekatvaṃ yokṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:148: yady ekaikasya paramāṇor digbhāgabhedo na syād ādityodaye katham anyatra chāyā bhavaty anyatrātapaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:149: na hi tasyānyaḥ pradeśo 'sti yatrātapo na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:150: āvaraṇaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavati paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantareṇa yadi digbhāgabhedo neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:151: na hi kaścid api paramāṇoḥ parabhāgo 'sti yatrāgamanād anyenānyasya pratighātaḥ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:152: asati ca pratighāte sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ saṃghātaḥ [Vvs_8] paramāṇumātraḥ syād ity uktaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:153: kim evaṃ neṣyate piṇḍasya te chāyāvṛtī na paramāṇor iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:154: kiṃ khalu paramāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate yasya te syātāṃ / nety āha /
SA20vasvvmsu:155: anyo na piṇḍaś cen na tasya te // 14 //
SA20vasvvmsu:156: yadi nānyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate na te tasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:157: saṃniveśaparikalpa eṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ saṃghāta iti vā //
SA20vasvvmsu:163: yat tac cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayo nīlapītādikam iṣyate kiṃ tad ekaṃ dravyam atha vā tad anekam iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:166: ekatve na krameṇetir yugapan na grahāgrahau /
SA20vasvvmsu:167: vicchinnānekavṛttiś ca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // 15 //
SA20vasvvmsu:168: yadi yāvad vicchinnaṃ nānekaṃ cakṣuṣo viṣayas tad ekaṃ dravyaṃ kalpyate pṛthivyāṃ krameṇetir na syād gamanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:170: arvāgbhāgasya ca grahaṇaṃ parabhāgasya cāgrahaṇaṃ yugapan na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:171: na hi tasyaiva tadānīṃ grahaṇaṃ cāgrahaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
SA20vasvvmsu:172: vicchinnasya cānekasya hastyaśvādikasyaikatra vṛttir na syād yatraiva hy ekaṃ tatraivāparam iti kathaṃ tayor viccheda iṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:173: kathaṃ vā tad ekaṃ yat prāptaṃ ca tābhyāṃ na ca prāptam antarāle tac chūnyagrahaṇāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:174: sūkṣmāṇāṃ caudakajantūnāṃ sthūlaiḥ samānarūpāṇām anīkṣaṇaṃ na syād /
SA20vasvvmsu:175: yadi lakṣaṇabhedād eva dravyāntaratvaṃ kalpyate nānyathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:178: tasyāsiddhau rūpādīnāṃ cakṣurādiviṣayatvam asiddham iti siddhaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ bhavatīti //
SA20vasvvmsu:179: pramāṇavaśād astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā nirdhāryate sarveṣāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ gariṣṭam ity asaty arthe katham iyaṃ buddhir bhavati pratyakṣam iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:183: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ // 16 //
SA20vasvvmsu:184_0: yadā ca sā pratyakṣabuddhir bhavatīdaṃ me pratyakṣam iti tadā na so 'rtho dṛśyate
SA20vasvvmsu:184_1: manovijñānenaiva paricchedāc cakṣurvijñānasya ca tadā niruddhatvād iti kathaṃ tasya
SA20vasvvmsu:185: viśeṣeṇa tu kṣaṇikasya viṣayasya tadānīṃ [Vvs_9] niruddham evaṃ tad rūpaṃ rasādikaṃ vā //
SA20vasvvmsu:186: nānanubhūtaṃ manovijñānena smaryata ity avaśyam arthānubhavena bhavitavyaṃ tac ca darśanam ity evaṃ tadviṣayasya rūpādeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ mataṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:187: asiddham idam anubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavatīti / yasmāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:189: vināpy arthena yathārthābhāsā cakṣurvijñānādikā vijñaptir utpadyate tathoktaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:191: tato hi vijñapteḥ smṛtisaṃprayuktā tatpratibhāsaiva rūpādivikalpikā manovijñaptir utpadyata iti na smṛtyutpādād arthānubhavaḥ sidhyati /
SA20vasvvmsu:192: yadi yathā svapne vijñaptir abhūtārthaviṣayā tathā jāgrato 'pi syāt tathaiva tadabhāvaṃ lokaḥ svayam avagacchet /
SA20vasvvmsu:194: tasmān na svapna ivārthopalabdhiḥ sarvā nirarthikā /
SA20vasvvmsu:197: evaṃ vitathavikalpābhyāsavāsanānidrayā prasupto lokaḥ svapna ivābhūtam arthaṃ paśyan na prabuddhas tadabhāvaṃ yathāvan nāvagacchati /
SA20vasvvmsu:198: yadā tu tatpratipakṣalokottaranirvikalpajñānalābhāt prabuddho bhavati tadā tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānasaṃmukhībhāvād viṣayābhāvaṃ yathāvad avagacchatīti samānam etat //
SA20vasvvmsu:199: yadi svasaṃtānapariṇāmaviśeṣād eva satvānām arthapratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante nārthaviśeṣāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:200: tadā ya eṣa pāpakalyāṇamitrasaṃparkāt sadasaddharmaśravaṇāc ca vijñaptiniyamaḥ sattvānāṃ sa kathaṃ sidhyati asati sadasatsaṃparke taddeśanāyāṃ ca /
SA20vasvvmsu:202: sarveṣāṃ hi sattvānām anyonyavijñaptyādhipatyena mitho vijñapter niyamo bhavati yathāyogaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:204: ataḥ saṃtānāntaravijñaptiviśeṣāt saṃtānāntare vijñaptiviśeṣa utpadyate nārthaviśeṣāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:205: yadi yathā svapne nirarthikā vijñaptir evaṃ jāgrato 'pi syāt kasmāt kuśalākuśalasamudācāro suptāsuptayos tulyaṃ phalam iṣṭāniṣṭam āyatyāṃ na bhavati / yasmāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:207: idam atra kāraṇāṃ na tv arthasadbhāvaḥ //
SA20vasvvmsu:208: yadi vijñāptimātram evedaṃ na kasyacit kāyo 'sti na vāk //
SA20vasvvmsu:209: katham upakramyamāṇānām aurabhrikādibhir urabhrādīnāṃ [Vvs_10] maraṇaṃ bhavti /
SA20vasvvmsu:210: atatkṛte vā tanmaraṇe katham aurabhrikādīnāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena yogo bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:217: tathā paravijñaptiviśeṣādhipatyāt pareṣāṃ jīvitendriyavirodhinī kācid vikriyotpadyate yayā sabhāgasaṃtativicchedākhyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavatīti veditavyaṃ //
SA20vasvvmsu:220: manodaṇḍasya hi mahāsāvadyatvaṃ sādhayatā bhagavatopālir gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:221: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kena tāni daṇḍakāraṇyāni mātaṅgāraṇyāni kaliṅgāraṇyāni śūnyāni medhyībhūtāni /
SA20vasvvmsu:223: śrutaṃ me bho gautama ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇeti /
SA20vasvvmsu:224: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // 20 //
SA20vasvvmsu:226_0: tadabhiprasannair amānuṣais tadvāsinaḥ sattvā utsāditā na tv ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣān
SA20vasvvmsu:226_1: mṛtā ity evaṃ sati kathaṃ tena karmaṇā manodaṇḍaḥ kāyavāgdaṇḍābhyāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ siddho bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:228: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ paracittavidaḥ kiṃ paracittaṃ jānanty atha na /
SA20vasvvmsu:230: yadi na jānanti kathaṃ paracittavido bhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:237: tathā tadajñānāt tadubhayaṃ na yathārthaṃ vitathapratibhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāprahīṇatvāt //
SA20vasvvmsu:240: kṛteyaṃ sarvathā sā tu na cintyā
SA20vasvvmsu:242: sarvaprakārā tu sā mādṛśaiś cintayituṃ na śakyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:244: kasya punaḥ sā sarvathā gocara ity āha /
SA20vasvvmsu:246: buddhānāṃ hi sā bhagavatāṃ sarvaprakāraṃ gocaraḥ sarvākārasarvajñeyajñānāvighātād iti //
